solution: Notice that $501^2 - 499^2$ can also be expressed as $(501+499)(501-499)$. This is the same as $1000 \cdot 2$, so our answer is $\boxed{2000}$.
model_solution:
## Step 1: Apply the difference of squares formula
$501^2 - 499^2 = (501 + 499)(501 - 499)$
## Step 2: Calculate the value
$(501 + 499)(501 - 499) = 1000 \times 2$
## Step 3: Calculate the product
$1000 \times 2 = 2000$
## Step 4: 
$2000$
$2000$
$2000$
